phrases: Zankoku na tenshi no youni Like an angel without a sense of mercy...
Shonen yo shinwa ni nare...rise young boy to the heavens as a legend.
Aoi kaze ga i am about to Cold winds, as blue as the sea...
Tear open the door to your heart...
But unknowing you seem, just staring at me...
Sotto fureru mono Desperate for something to touch...
Motomeru koto ni muchu de A moment of kindness like that in a dream..
Your innocent eyes as yet have no idea...
Itaikena hitomi...of the path your destiny will follow.
But someday you will become aware of...
Sono senaka niwa...everything that you have got behind you.
Your wings are for seeking out...
Hanega arukoto...a new future that only you can search for.
Madobe kara yagate tobitatsu...through a portal like your pulsing blood.
Hotobashiru atsui pathos de If you should betray the chapel of your memories...
Omoide wo uragiru nara...the cruel angel will enter the window of your soul.
So boy, stand tall and embrace the fire of legend...
Embrace the universe like a blazing star!
I am so lucky that I can go shopping with you today, Kaji!
Is not this the swimsuit section?
Is not this the swimsuit section?
Please allow us to announce a call for a customer.
Please allow us to announce a call for a customer.
Mr. Yamazaki, your friend is waiting for you.
You are a little young for that.
Mr. Yamazaki, your friend is waiting for you.
You are just being an old fuddy-duddy, Kaji.
Please come to Customer Service on the first floor.
This is what is in fashion these days.
Please come to Customer Service on the first floor.
This is what is in fashion these days.
I am anxious about this school trip.
I just know we will have a great time.
And where are you going for the trip?
We are even scheduled to go scuba diving!
It is been three years since I have gone diving.
Say, where did you go for your school trip?
Well, we did not have one.
I cannot go on the trip?!
Because you are on stand-by for combat duty.
You never told me anything about that!
Who in the hell decided that?!
Hey, why do not you stop slurping that tea, and say something!
Actually, I kind of anticipated it would be like this.
And you have already given up?
Nothing's more useless than a housebroken male.
Please do not talk about me like that.
I know how you must feel,
but there is no other way.
There is always the possibility of an Angel attack while you are gone.
We have always got to be ready to defend against an enemy who may not even come!
Why do not you try to find out where they are, and attack first?!
If we could do that, we would have already done it.
Look, think of this as an opportunity to catch up.
While the rest of your class is on the trip,
the two of you can study.
Or do you think I do not know about these?
If you thought you had to tell me what your test scores were,
Finding out what your grades are
The old fashioned grading system used here means nothing to me.
When in Rome, do as the Romans do.
You could at least try to adjust to Japanese school life.
Asuka, I will bring you some souvenirs!
Well, it is just too bad for you guys!
Do not feel bad, I will have enough fun for both of you!
Post the survey data on Mt. Asama
from Balthasar to Melchior as soon as possible.
That is pretty casual behavior for times like these.
Well, it is because the times are so hard
that they want to have a little fun while they can.
You are such an obedient student, Mr. Big Shot.
Well, I would have to anyway.
Since I cannot go scuba diving in Okinawa, I am going to do it here!
You cannot solve an easy problem like this?
How can you solve a difficult problem like this,
and not make good grades on your tests?
Because I could not figure out what the questions said.
You mean you could not read the questions in Japanese?
Right, I have not learned all of the Kanji yet.
I did not have to study it in college.
things expand when they get hot, and shrink when they get cold.
Well, it sounds easy enough in theory.
If I were to warm up my breasts, do you think they would grow bigger?
How would I know such things?!
You are such a boring little boy.
This just is not clear enough.
But the report from Mt. Asama Earthquake Research indicates
that we should take a closer look at this shadow.
Of course, we cannot ignore this.
The pressure resistant partition is cracking.
If it breaks, we will pay for the damage.
The probe has imploded due to the extreme pressure.
From now on, this laboratory will be completely sealed off.
It is under NERV's jurisdiction now!
Any and all access to the outside world is prohibited.
All records of the events of the past six hours are classified.
I need an A-17 from Commander Ikari, top priority!
Have you forgotten what happened fifteen years ago?
to move from a defensive posture to an offensive one.
However, I am sure you are aware how important it is
to obtain a living Angel as a sample, are not you?
If we fail, it will result in the extinction of the human race.
Are you really going to do it?
Yes, it is something like a chrysalis priorto reaching the adult stage.
This operation's prime objective is to capture this Angel.
We must capture it alive, as close to its original state as possible.
Then you must destroy it immediately.
The designated pilot for the actual operation is...
The designated pilot for the actual operation is...
I know it is going to be me.
You will carry out the mission using Unit 02.
Unit 00 does not conform to the special equipment we will be using.
Rei and Unit 00 will remain at headquarters on stand-by.
You do not get to go to the hot springs.
Now an A-17 has been ordered, we must scramble immediately.
This heat resistant plug suit does not seem any different.
Press the switch on your right wrist.
The suit is designed to protect you from heat, pressure and radiation.
This is Type-D equipment, for combat under extreme environmental duress.
I do not want to appear in public in this dorky outfit!
This is the sort of thing Shinji's for!
I was anticipating seeing Asuka's gallant figure!
Really, I cannot let Kaji see me in this awful looking thing.
No, I do not want you touching my Unit 02!
I would rather do it than let her take my place.
I am sorry about the look.
Have both units stand-by in position.
Move in the laser bore, and ready the crane.
Hey, is not Kaji here yet?
That male buffoon will not be here.
It is not any of his business.
I wanted him to see how great I am.
That includes the freeze of all current assets.
I assume that means some people will be getting into a bit of trouble.
Why did not you stop them?
I had no excuse for stopping it.
This order is an official one.
Surely you must know that if NERV fails, the whole world will perish.
The YOU.N. and the Air Force will be on stand-by alert...
No, they are here to clean up...
They will use N2 depth charges to destroy the Angel, and us with it.
Who would order something like that?
The bore path has been secured.
The Type D equipment is functioning normally.
Unit 02 is in position to dispatch.
Even with this, the range of clarity is no more than 120.
We are over the maximum safety depth.
Unit 02 has reached estimated target level.
The lava circulation is faster than we thought.
The target's velocity does not match our predictions.
A crack has occurred in the second coolant pipe.
We are over the maximum allowed depth.
It has not contacted the target yet?
I just want to finish this and take a shower, AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.
There is a nice hot springs near here.
We will hit it once we are done.
Just hang in there just a little longer.
Eva Unit 02 has lost its progressive knife.
Captain Katsuragi, we have got to stop!
Have you forgotten that there is a human being in there?
I am in charge of this operation.
Unit 02 has reached the corrected target depth.
Due to the motion of the currents moving you and the target,
you will have just one chance to make contact.
Who do you think you are asking?
Fear is worse than danger itself.
But this is not a plug suit.
I want to take a bath.
The tension let loose all at once.
You were scared about this operation, were not you?
You were scared about this operation, were not you?
Yes, if it would gone wrong, there might have been another disaster.
Nobody would want to repeat that again.
It is much earlier than we predicted!
There is no way it can withstand this!
Destroying the Angel is now top priority!
Unit 02, withdraw, and prepare for combat!
This is what I have waited for!
Damn, I forgot I dropped the knife!
It is right in front of me!
In addition to that, I have got lousy visibility, I am too hot,
and this disgusting suit's stuck to my body with sweat.
We will drop you Unit 01's knife.
How could it open its mouth in such an environment?
If it can withstand such a high heat, high pressure environment,
then the progressive knife will be useless against it!
Transfer all coolant pressure to cable three!
The bath is over there, to the left.
I never thought a bath could feel this good.
Would you throw me the body shampoo?
You dork, watch where you are throwing!
He hit me in my most essential part!
Wow, your skin is so soft and smooth, Asuka!
I got this in the Second Impact.
You know all about my past, do not you?
It is a part of my job.
It is all ancient history now.
When Tokyo-3's power supply is cut off,
an Angel arrives at NERV HQ to find it completely locked up.
Can the kids make it to headquarters in time to intercept the Angel?
